item.title: Blogging & Social Media For Business Seminar
item.description: Evert Bopp of the Greenhouse Incubator contacted me about this great looking event in the Absolute Hotel in Limerick on June 13th. They are running a full day Blogging & Social Media for Business seminar where you will be able to listen and talk to Irelandsâ€™ leading experts in social media & online networking. * Bernard Goldbach: Senior Creative Multimedia Lecturer, University External Examiner, Writer & Podcaster. * Krishna De: Brand Engagement and Word of Mouth Marketing commentator.
